body.name: Gevi 4 Cups Small Coffee Maker, Compact Coffee Machine with Reusable Filter, Warming Plate and Coffee Pot for Home and Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 40 mins
features: EASY OPERATION-Just press the ON/OFF switch to brew and enjoy flavorful coffee in minutes. ON/OFF indicator light lets you know when your coffee maker is on or off.
KEEP WARM-Stain-resistant warming plate keeps coffee warm until you turn it off, ensuring every cup you drink is hot coffee.
REUSABLE FILTER-No need for paper filters. Removable filter basket for quick and easy cleanup.
PAUSE & SERVE FEATURE-Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause stops cycle if you need a cup before brewing is finished.
COMPACT SIZE-Space-saving 4 cups (1 cup = 5 oz) coffee machine with visible 600ml large capacity tank, perfect for home and Office use.

I think the coffee tastes a little weak, what can I do to make good taste coffee. Hello. There are 3 main factors that affect the taste of coffee, one is the bean, the other is the thickness of the coffee powder, and the other is the amount of coffee powder. It brews slower and takes more time to finish brewing. what is the problem? Does descaling need to be done? Yes. The cause of your?problem may be that there is a build-up of limescale inside the boiler or heating tube, which will result in a slower flow of water, which ultimately results in a longer brewing time. Why is my coffee overflowing from the filter? There are several reasons: 1.Adding too much ground coffee to the filter. 2. Use filter paper and permanent filter at the same time. 3. Misplacement of carafe. 4.Carafe is taken away for more than 30s during the brewing process. I Just received the Gevi coffee maker and it feels too small Hi, thanks for your question about our machine. Gevi 4 Cups Small Coffee Maker is positioned as small and exquisite, which is characterized by small size but large capacity, saving space for you. There is water coming out of the back of the 4 cup coffee maker There is an overflow hole on the back of the machine, when you add water to the water tank beyond the MAX line, the water will flow out of the overflow hole. So please be careful not to exceed the MAX line when adding water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for use at hotels while on a trip. Works really well. Love the reusable screen bucket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Filter holder needs to be inserted correctly
reviews.reviewText: I read other reviews with complaints about water leaking all over the counter. The filter holder needs to be placed with the tab to the back, seated properly. If a guest were to make the coffee, it is not obvious to do that. I only noticed due to having a leak issue on first run and closely looked at the holder...under bight light and saw tiny print with the instruction. Nowhere in the booklet did it say to do that.The lid was hard to open and close at first but after a couple of uses it is no problem....make sure it snaps in place.The carafe leaves a small amount of coffee in it unless you turn it almost upside down.The carafe is hard to clean the interior with a dish rag due to a narrow opening... I am a woman with thin hands and can barely get my hand holding the rag in it... my husband has to use a bottle brush.With that all said, it is a good little coffee pot for the amount we paid. Coffee tastes good enough (we are not picky about coffee) and it makes about 2 measuring cups of coffee.I cannot speak for longevity since we have only had it about 3 weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Coffee Maker
reviews.reviewText: Loved the size of this coffee maker! Makes just enough or a little coffee. Like the coffee filter and the ease of use. Use it every morning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's OK for an inexpensive simple coffee maker with just an on and off switch. There is no automatic shut off, you have to turn it off yourself.Fist time trying it 1/31., I am a bit disappointed... brewing temperature isn't great. Optimal brewing temperature is between 195° and 205°, this doesn't come close. The hot plate doesn't keep the coffee hot, only Luke warm, and when you put in the creamer, the coffee is room temperature (yuk). So, I had to put it in the microwave to get it hot, Inconvenient. So, actually I'm doing double work.The built in filter is a good thing, saves on wasting paper filters. Just be careful when cleaning the filter cup tho, it is flimsy and can puncture easily. The coffee maker does make a rattling sound when brewing, makes me wonder if something is wrong or it could be the arm (issue fixed, it wasnt sitting right.).It puzzles me that the marks are clearly for 5 cups, but I can only make 3 cups... if I try to make 4 cups, during the brewing cycle, the coffee grounds wind up spilling over into the coffee pot and making a mess.I got this because the single serve coffee k-cups are getting too expensive.I'll update again April 30.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time ordering this particular coffee pot. I'm sure I wore out the first one, which I had for over two years. I used it every day and often two or three times in a day heating water to make tea. This little coffee pot makes the water the perfect temperature for either coffee or tea. I put the tea bags in the pot and turn it on letting the hot water steep the tea bags in the cute little pot. I really like that it heats up fast. It also keeps everything hot while I drink my first cup.Clean-up is easy; I use a vinegar solution of 4:1 water:vinegar and run it through at least two times. I didn't hesitate to order a second pot from the same supplier. I'm just glad they were still available. I like that the pot is glass, and I can see through it to see how much is left inside.There is only an on/off switch. No auto shut off. Also, no timer features to preset for morning coffee. This did not stop me from purchasing as I mentioned above it does not take long to heat up.I think it's a good buy for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Four cup coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: It's just my husband a I drinking coffee in the morning. This is the perfect pot for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GREAT FOR TRAVEL
reviews.reviewText: Most hotels put KEURIG pod type coffee makers in their rooms. If you like this type of “coffee”, stop reading.This GEVI is small enough to take on road-trips. It comes with a permanent filter basket, so all you need is fresh ground coffee. Brew temperature isn’t quite high enough, and long-term durability is questionable. But, this inexpensive compact unit brews coffee that’s orders-of-magnitude better than hotel pod machines.
